section.title: Overview
section.para: This module is an implementation of the AAA API from the core. It provides the implementation for the callback functions required the API.
Any module that wishes to use it has to do the following:

para.emphasis: make a bind call with a proper radius specific url

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para: One of the following libraries must be installed before running &osips; with this module loaded:
By default, radiusclient-ng is used. To change at compile time to freeradius, uncomment the USE_FREERADIUS=1 line in main Makefile.

section.title: Exported Parameters
section.para: The module does not export parameters to be used in the configuration script.
This function binds the aaa modules and fills the structure with the callback functions implemented by the module.
